resources.string: When enabled, the screen will dim according to the intensity that you have set
When enabled, the screen will permanently stay on unless you lock your screen
This is an app widget description
This app needs your permission to display over other apps. This is required because this app will draw an overlay on the screen in which you will then be able to adjust its brightness.
Once you are brought to the new screen, search for the Lightswitch app, click on it, and enable the setting.
